author: "Borel, Pierre, 1620?-1671"
title: "Petri Borelli Historiarum et observationum medicophysicarum centuri¾ IV quibus ipse quidem subjunxit Isaaci Cattieri ... Observationes medicinales raras secum communicatas, Renatique Cartesii vitam a se perscirptam nunc autem aliunde ob argumenti similitu"
